summary: Build a website for the mobile repair shop "Doctor Phone Repair" including a simple one-page business site (services/pricing, locations, contact info) plus advanced features like online appointment booking.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal repair-themed logo mark with text "Doctor Phone Repair" (doctor-phone-repair-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero illustration showing a smartphone repair workspace (tools, phone, clean modern style) (doctor-phone-repair-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public, responsive website for the mobile repair shop named "Doctor Phone Repair" with clear sections for Services & Pricing, Locations, and Contact details using the exact information provided (prices in Rs, two addresses, two phone numbers, and Gmail).
Add an online appointment booking flow where visitors can submit a repair appointment request via a form, see a success confirmation, and have the request persisted in the backend canister.
Add an admin-only appointments page in the frontend that lets authorized users sign in with Internet Identity and view the list of submitted appointments (read-only is sufficient).

Apply a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a phone repair business and use it consistently across all pages and sections (avoid a blue/purple default palette).

Add generated static brand assets (logo and hero illustration) to the frontend and render them on the site (store under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a basic one-page business website for Doctor Phone Repair with services/pricing, locations, and contact details
Add advanced website features including online appointment booking
Implement backend appointment data model and APIs to create appointments and to list appointments for authorized shop admins only (using a backend-configured allowlist of admin principals).
